aka: 戈登·拉姆齐的终极家常菜
trans_title: 戈登·拉姆齐的家常菜 第一季
戈登·拉姆齐的终极家常菜
introduction: Gordon Ramsay Is One Of The World's Most Celebrated Chefs, With Two Distinct Sides To His Cooking. In His Restaurants He's Known For Serving Stunningly Intricate Dishes, While At Home His Food Is Just As Delicious But Simpler, Faster And Easier To Make. Now In This Practical Home Cookery Series He Teaches Viewers How To Cook Amazing Food Every Day, For Breakfast, Lunch And Dinner.
chinese_title: 戈登·拉姆齐的家常菜 第一季
